wtsproc.config: Vehicle has PTO and PTO pump attached to transmission.

step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Open hood assembly.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Drain automatic transmission assembly fluid into suitable container.
Remove drive shaft behind transmission as needed.
Remove bench seat assembly (2/3 bench).
Remove right door sill trim plate.
Position cab floor mat over driver's seat.
Remove cab floor pan.
Remove rear transmission support bar gaining access through floor pan opening.
Disconnect PTO pump p-clips retaining hoses to support brackets if applicable.
Remove PTO pump bracket if applicable.
Remove PTO pump from PTO if applicable. Secure out of way.
Disconnect wiring as needed to remove transmission.
Disconnect oil dipstick tube from transmission.
Disconnect oil cooler lines, include p-clips. Remove p-clip with bracket attached from transmission bell housing.
Disconnect starter wiring.
Remove starter motor assembly.
Remove flywheel inspection plate.
Remove torque converter assembly bolts.
Remove bolts retaining transmission to engine EXCEPT TWO.
Install transmission jack to transmission and secure.
Remove any remaining bolts retaining transmission to engine. Remove transmission.
Install transmission assembly to engine.

note.para: Be sure torque converter is fully seated into pump

step1.para: Install bolts retaining transmission to engine.
Remove jack from transmission. Return jack to equipment area.
Install torque converter assembly bolts and torque to spec.
Install flywheel inspection plate.
Install starter motor assembly.
Connect starter wiring.
Connect oil cooler lines, include p-clips. Install p-clip with bracket attached to transmission bell housing.
Connect oil dipstick tube to transmission, include p-clip.
Install rear transmission support bar through floor pan opening.

note.para: Insure transmission wiring harness is above support bar

step1.para: Connect wiring to transmission.
Install drive shaft behind transmission with second shaft attached, connect last shaft. Torque to spec.
Install PTO pump to PTO if applicable.
Install PTO pump bracket if applicable.
Connect PTO pump p-clips retaining hoses to support brackets if applicable.
Install cab floor pan.
Place cab floor mat into original position.
Install right door sill trim plate.
Install bench seat assembly (2/3 bench).
Fill automatic transmission assembly with proper fluid.
Connect battery to ground cable, include connect ECM ground.
Start engine and check for leaks. Recheck fluid level and adjust as needed.
Close hood assembly.
Remove wheel chocks.
